languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, вы... уже уходите? Но ведь все так ждут вашего решения... Нижайше прошу, поговорите с губернатором Драйвстемом перед уходом..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы... уже уходите? Но ведь все так ждут вашего решения... Нижайше прошу, поговорите с губернатором Драйвстемом перед уходом..."

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы... уже уходите? Но ведь все так ждут вашего решения... Нижайше прошу, поговорите с губернатором Драйвстемом перед уходом..."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak with Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak with Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."

languages.text: 「陛下、もう…行かれるのですか？ですが、皆があなたの判断を今か今かと待っています…恐れ入りますが、出発前にドライブステン総督と話されてはいかがでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、もう…行かれるのですか？ですが、皆があなたの判断を今か今かと待っています…恐れ入りますが、出発前にドライブステン総督と話されてはいかがでしょう…」

languages.text: “大人，您……您这就要走了吗？但大家还在心急如焚地等着您的判决呢……我恳请您在离开之前与德莱夫斯塔总督谈谈……”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您……您这就要走了吗？但大家还在心急如焚地等着您的判决呢……我恳请您在离开之前与德莱夫斯塔总督谈谈……”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, vous... nous quittez déjà ? Mais tout le monde attend votre verdict avec impatience... Je vous demande humblement de parler au gouverneur Drivestem avant de partir... »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, vous... nous quittez déjà ? Mais tout le monde attend votre verdict avec impatience... Je vous demande humblement de parler au gouverneur Drivestem avant de partir... »

languages.text: «¿Ya se marcha? Todos esperan ansiosos su veredicto... Le pido humildemente que hable con el gobernador Drivestem antes de marcharse».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ya se marcha? Todos esperan ansiosos su veredicto... Le pido humildemente que hable con el gobernador Drivestem antes de marcharse».

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... brecht Ihr bereits auf? Aber alle warten doch so gebannt auf Euer Urteil ... Ich bitte Euch demütig, mit Gouverneur Drivestem zu sprechen, bevor Ihr geht ..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... brecht Ihr bereits auf? Aber alle warten doch so gebannt auf Euer Urteil ... Ich bitte Euch demütig, mit Gouverneur Drivestem zu sprechen, bevor Ihr geht ..."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... hemen ayrılacak mısınız? Fakat herkes kararınızı duymak için can atıyor... Haddim değil ama gitmeden evvel Vali Drivestem ile konuşmanızı rica ederim..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are you... leaving already? But everyone is waiting so eagerly for your verdict... I humbly ask you to speak to Governor Drivestem before leaving..."
